WebTeX Test Page

Valid LaTeX Expressions

Inline Math

This is an inline equation: $E = mc^2$

Another example: $\sum_{i=1}^n i = \frac{n(n+1)}{2}$

Display Math

This is a display equation:

$$\int_{-\infty}^\infty e^{-x^2} \, dx = \sqrt{\pi}$$

Expressions with Undefined Commands

These expressions contain undefined commands and should fall back gracefully:

Single Undefined Command

This contains an undefined command: $\invalidcommand$

This contains a defined command followed by an undefined one: $\sin(x) + \invalidcommand$

Undefined Command with Arguments

Undefined command with argument: $\invalidcommand{arg}$

Malformed Expressions

These expressions are malformed but should still render something:

Unbalanced Braces

Missing closing brace: $\frac{1}{2$

Extra closing brace: $x^2}$

Incomplete Commands

Incomplete \text command: $a + \text$

Malformed integral: $\int_0^{$
